actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice

official_title: A bill for the relief of Harold M. Wakefield.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual in full satisfaction of all claims of such individual against the United States for damages resulting from any negligence of federally employed officials in the administration and application of the Organized Crime Control Act of 1970 and the incarceration of a convicted felon.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Harold M. Wakefield.
